mph.beans.sessions

Interface TeamManagementFunctionalities

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StudentManagerRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StudentManager

    interface TeamManagementFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to manage a project team.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      void setTeamEnrollmentRequests(TeamIdDTO theTeamId, boolean areRequestsClosed)
      Set the possibility of a project team to accept new incoming membership requests

    • Method Detail

      • getPendingJoinRequests

        java.util.Set<JoinRequestIdDTO> getPendingJoinRequests(TeamIdDTO theTeamId)
                                                       throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                                              UserNotLoggedInException
        Parameters:
        theTeamId - the id of the team
        Returns:
        the set of incoming membership requests for the project team given as parameter
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if the argument is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in

      • setTeamEnrollmentRequests

        void setTeamEnrollmentRequests(TeamIdDTO theTeamId,
                             boolean areRequestsClosed)
                               throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                      UserNotLoggedInException,
                                      ForbiddenOperationException
        Set the possibility of a project team to accept new incoming membership requests
        Parameters:
        theTeamId - the id of the team
        areRequestsClosed - true means the project team given as parameter will not accept incoming requests
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if one of the arguments is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in
        ForbiddenOperationException - if the user is not allowed to execute the operation
